name: Paradox Lost: Volume One
description:
Your name is MSPAREADER  and you just woke up on an ALIEN PLANET. 

And not even the alien planet you're used to! 

Here on Alternian Colony 4.444 you'll find 12 new trolls to befriend, strange puzzles to solve, and a mystery to confront which will change your understanding of the mechanics by which SBURB generates new universes, and challenge the very concept of an Alpha Timeline.

This is Volume One: OVERTURE (A PARADOX AT SHOWTIME), first of a planned 12 volumes which will introduce a dozen original characters inspired by the Eastern Zodiac and stories such as the Legend of White Snake, The Butterfly Lovers, Lady Meng Jiang, the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl, and Journey to the West. 

Though inspired by the format of Friendsim with each volume featuring a different character, each troll you meet will continue to be involved in the story as you move forward in search of answers about how you came to be on this planet-- and also about a death and the tragic events that led to it which have driven apart the twelve trolls you must reunite if you hope to survive.

Buckle up. I've got big plans for this one.

---

I've been working on this for a year so far and I've put a ton of time and love into it and I'm so excited to finally show it to you! I hope you love these characters and this story as much as I do.
